overview: CPG Systems in Vancouver, BC is your business computer support specialists. Providing on site and remote computer and networking services for businesses, fixing software and hardware, upgrades, installation, technical support, virus removal, web hosting and design. From SOHO to large offices, we can help de-mystify your computers, and help you get back to what you do best - running your business.
